Summary: Biochemical reaction from 10-monohydroxy oxcarbazepine to dihydroxycarbazepine.
Biochemical reaction from eslicarbazepine acetate to 10-monohydroxy oxcarbazepine. This interaction is catalyzed by AADAC.

Controller: AKR1C1, AKR1C2, AKR1C3, AKR1C4, CBR1, CBR3
Summary: Biochemical reaction from oxcarbazepine to 10-monohydroxy oxcarbazepine. This interaction can be catalyzed by AKR1C3, CBR1, CBR3, AKR1C4, AKR1C1 or AKR1C2.
Biochemical reaction from 10-monohydroxy oxcarbazepine to oxcarbazepine glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B7 or UGT1A9.
Transport from oxcarbazepine to oxcarbazepine. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC2 or ABCB1.
Transport from 10-monohydroxy oxcarbazepine to 10-monohydroxy oxcarbazepine. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCB1.
